metadata.description: Specifies the location for all resources.
Specifies the environment of the deployment.
Specifies the prefix for all resources created in this deployment.
Specifies the tags that you want to apply to all resources.
Specifies the partner deployment.
Specifies the address space of the vnet of the mainframe landing zone.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for app services of the mainframe landing zone.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for data services of the mainframe landing zone.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for integration services of the mainframe landing zone.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for external storage services of the mainframe landing zone.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for logging services of the mainframe landing zone.
Specifies the resource Id of the vnet in the hub.
Specifies the private IP address of the central firewall.
Specifies the public IP address of the central firewall. this is required for AKS
Specifies the private IP addresses of the dns servers.
Specifies the administrator username for the VMs and data services.
Specifies the administrator password of the sql servers.
Specifies the subscription IDs of the other Data Landing Zones.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Key Vault.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Data Factory.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Data Factory Portal.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Blob Storage.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Azure Sql Server.

variables.name: [toLower(format('{0}-{1}', parameters('prefix'), parameters('environment')))]
variables.Sysguid: [if(not(equals(variables('guidforluminex'), '')), variables('guidforluminex'), if(not(equals(variables('guidforgenericaks'), '')), variables('guidforgenericaks'), if(not(equals(variables('guidforopentext'), '')), variables('guidforopentext'), if(not(equals(variables('guidfortmaxsoft'), '')), variables('guidfortmaxsoft'), if(not(equals(variables('guidforraincode'), '')), variables('guidforraincode'), if(not(equals(variables('guidforstromasys'), '')), variables('guidforstromasys'), 'PID-4241702A-BF95-4B5D-82E7-364BF62FE998'))))))]

metadata.description: Specifies the name of the File Share. File share names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only.
Specifies the name of the Azure Storage account.
The name of the Azure Container Registry
The location of the ACR and where to deploy the module resources to
How the deployment script should be forced to execute
Azure RoleId that are required for the DeploymentScript resource to import images
Does the Managed Identity already exists, or should be created
Name of the Managed Identity resource
For an existing Managed Identity, the Subscription Id it is located in
For an existing Managed Identity, the Resource Group it is located in
A delay before the script import operation starts. Primarily to allow Azure AAD Role Assignments to propagate
When the script resource is cleaned up
The Git Repository URL, eg. https://github.com/YOURORG/YOURREPO.git
The name of the repository branch to use
The docker context working directory, change this when your Dockerfile and source files are ALL located in a repo subdirectory
The subdirectory relative to the working directory that contains the Dockerfile
The name of the dockerfile
The image name/path you want to create in ACR
The image tag you want to create
The ACR compute platform needed to build the image

variables.$fxv#0:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "Waiting on RBAC replication ($initialDelay)"
sleep $initialDelay

az acr build --resource-group $acrResourceGroup \
  --registry $acrName \
  --image $taggedImageName $repo \
  --file $dockerfilePath \
  --platform $platform

metadata.description: The ACR uri the image can be accessed on if building was successful

resources.scope: [format('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{0}/blobServices/{1}/containers/{2}', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2])]
resources.name: [guid(uniqueString(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2]), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', variables('datafactorySubscriptionId'), variables('datafactoryResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.DataFactory/factories', variables('datafactoryName'))))]

resources.scope: [format('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{0}/blobServices/{1}/containers/{2}', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2])]
resources.name: [guid(uniqueString(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2]), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', variables('datafactorySubscriptionId'), variables('datafactoryResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.DataFactory/factories', variables('datafactoryName'))))]
